translation.en: Uh, in case you need a taxi while you're here.

translation.ko: - 좋은 시간 보내세요 - 잠깐만요, 택시비 드려야죠

translation.en: Uh, it's been taken care of.
Oh, well, at least let me tip you then.
Aw, it's so good to see you.
I can't believe we're finally here. We're doing this.
I know. Come on. I've been waiting to open the duty-free.
Yeah. Oh, you waited. That's a first.
Thanks for paying for the taxi.
Thank Jay. It's all on him.
Can we move in? Stay forever?
translation.ko: 아예 이사 와서 영영 살면 안 되나?

translation.en: Never going home. Think Rob would notice?
-I think I forgot. -Well, you'll just have to go naked.
-You didn't have to get me anything. -I wanted to, though.
I just wanted to say thank you for planning this whole thing.
And I've… I've really missed you so much.
[Beth] Here. I know you love black onyx.
I don't know what to wear. Nothing fancy enough.
translation.ko: 뭘 입을지 모르겠어 근사한 게 하나도 없어

translation.en: [Rob] So just go in your granny panties. You'll still look great.
translation.ko: 할머니 팬티 입어 당신은 그래도 예쁠 거야

translation.en: I'm so tired. I just want to go to bed.
So go to bed. It's your holiday too.
No, no. Kate booked a restaurant. It'll be fun.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 레스토랑 예약했대 재밌을 거야

translation.en: She misses your boobs, she says.
[laughs] What do you think? New dress.
I went on the post-breakup shopping spree to end all shopping sprees.
Oh, hey, Rob. How's it going?
Oh, is that my gorgeous goddaughter?
-Give her a kiss from me. -[Rob] I will.
I've got to put her down actually. You guys have a good night.
-I'll call you tomorrow. Bye. -Have a good time. Love you.
Ah, if I break my neck in these things, it's your fault.
translation.ko: 나 하이힐 때문에 넘어져서 목 부러지면 네 책임이다

translation.en: You look like a supermodel. You should keep them.
-Have you settled in okay? -Yeah. Hi, I'm Beth.
translation.ko: - 짐은 잘 풀었어요? - 네, 저는 베스예요

translation.en: -It's nice to meet you. -[car horn honks] Everything's great.
[Kate] Do you know what you want? [Beth] I don't know, but I need to eat soon.
translation.ko: - 뭐 먹을지 골랐어? - 아니, 근데 빨리 먹어야겠어

translation.en: I keep telling you it's on Jay.
He still hasn't taken me off his credit card.
I intend on discovering what the limit is before he notices.
translation.ko: 제이가 눈치채기 전에 한도가 얼마인지 알아보려고

translation.en: With any luck, he'll have an aneurysm and drop dead on top of his assistant.
translation.ko: 운 좋으면 동맥류 터져서 자기 비서 위에 엎드려 죽겠지

translation.en: Uh, we'll start with a dozen raw oysters and a bottle of champagne.
translation.ko: 일단 생굴 한 접시랑 샴페인 한 병 주세요

translation.en: -The most expensive one on the menu. -[chuckles] Excellent.
I should've been there for you.
You had a baby. You're forgiven.
I'm fine. Couldn't care less about Jay.
-And what about polyamory, girl? Ooh! -Polyamory, huh?
translation.ko: - 나 이제 다자 연애 할 거야 - 다자 연애?

translation.en: -[cork pops] -I can barely manage one relationship.
Anyway, enough about me. How about you?
translation.ko: 어쨌든 내 얘기는 됐고 넌 어떻게 지내?

translation.en: Mmm, and what about with you?
Are you getting any at least?
Isn't it about time you got back on the horse?
I… I just don't feel like it.
-Is he not doing it for you anymore? -[Beth] It's not Rob.
translation.ko: - 만족을 못 시켜줘? - 그런 거 아니야

translation.en: If you're not happy, take it from me, divorce is the answer.
translation.ko: 행복하지 않다면… 내 말 믿어, 이혼이 답이야

translation.en: Especially when it comes with a big fat alimony paycheck.
Shut up. Go away. Go away.
I'm afraid the card was rejected.
-Jay. -Did he find out about the card?
Yeah. Turns out I did discover the limit.
Do you want me to go halves?
-You get the drinks at the next place. -[Beth] Kate, I'm so sorry. I'm tired.
translation.ko: - 2차에서 네가 술 사 - 미안한데 나 피곤해

translation.en: -And my boobs are like gonna explode. -[Kate] No, no, no.
translation.ko: - 가슴도 터질 것 같고 - 안 돼

translation.en: I have to pump. They're full, and I can't.
translation.ko: 유축해야 해 잔뜩 부풀어서 안 되겠어

translation.en: -And we have the bike tour tomorrow. -Oh, yeah, the bike tour.
translation.ko: - 내일 자전거 투어도 있잖아 - 참, 그렇지
막 나가던 어린 시절로 돌아가 보자

translation.en: It took me months to convince you to come away.
translation.ko: 내가 너 부르려고 몇 달이나 졸랐잖아

translation.en: Who knows when we're going to do it again.
The entrance is just around there.
Oh, wait, wait, wait. I just want to fix my face and powder my nose.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 화장 고칠래 코에 파우더 좀 찍고

translation.en: California originally, but I've lived in London the last 15 years.
You left Syria because of the war.
No, not, not very well. Um, just a little bit.
I work with the Global Rescue Initiative, or I used to.
translation.ko: 국제 구조 단체에서 일해서요 아니, 전에 일했죠

translation.en: -No, no, you get the next round. -[bartender] What can I get you?
translation.ko: - 아니, 다음 거 내 - 뭐 드릴까요?

translation.en: Oh my God, look over there. Hot.
-[bartender] Here you go. -We should go over there.
-Mind if we join you? -No, I'm sure they're waiting for someone.
translation.ko: 합석해도 될까요? 누구 기다리시는 걸 거야

translation.en: No, no, please, be our guests.
I don't think I've seen you here before.
[man 2] I love your dress. You look like a disco ball.
You want to see pictures of my baby?
When was the last time you got hit on by someone that hot?
translation.ko: 저렇게 섹시한 사람이 너한테 작업 건 거 얼마 만이야?

translation.en: Come on, we were just saying you need to get back on the horse.
translation.ko: 너 다시 즐길 때 됐다고 했잖아

translation.en: [Kate] So? Rob doesn't have to find out.
translation.ko: 그래서? 롭한테 말 안 하면 되지

translation.en: One night of excitement might bring you out of your rut.
translation.ko: 하룻밤만 신나게 즐기면 기분 전환이 될 거야

translation.en: We were just saying how you should come back to ours.
translation.ko: 우리 숙소로 같이 가면 좋겠다고 얘기하고 있었어요

translation.en: [on voicemail] Hi, you've got Kate, or maybe you haven't, so leave a message.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 케이트예요 통화 못 해요, 메시지 남겨요

translation.en: [Beth] Hey, did you get my text?

translation.ko: - 응? 아니, 미안해 - 나 너무 걱정돼

translation.en: It's already noon, and Kate hasn't come home. Okay.
So she's probably gone for a coffee or a wander or something.
I did. I drank a bit much.
Honestly, I can barely remember anything.
Right. And what are you doing today?
We're meant to be doing a bike tour.
There you go. That's why she's vanished. Should've told her it was a shopping tour.
translation.ko: 그래서 도망간 거네 쇼핑 투어라고 하지 그랬어

translation.en: She… She didn't leave a note, and she hasn't texted either.
-I'll let you know if I hear. Love you. -[Rob] Bye.
I'm sorry to bother you. Uh…
I'm looking for her. Um, Kate.
I think she went out, and I can't get a hold of her.
translation.ko: 나간 것 같은데 연락이 안 되네요 전화를 안 받아요
연락이 안 되네요 전화를 안 받아요

translation.en: You haven't seen her, have you?
You're not allowed to have parties. It says so very clearly in the rules.
translation.ko: 파티는 하시면 안 돼요 규정에 확실히 써놨잖아요

translation.en: And I have to charge you for the two extra guests that stayed over.
translation.ko: 두 명이 더 자고 갔으니까 추가 금액 청구할 거예요

translation.en: [officer] What was the name of the bar?
[officer] Okay, let me see her photo.
So you brought two men back to your apartment.
-And you don't remember their names. -[Beth] Well…
-Had you been drinking? -[chuckles] Yeah, a little.
translation.ko: - 네, 몰라요 - 술을 마셨나요? 네, 조금요

translation.en: More than a little if you don't remember anything.
translation.ko: 필름이 끊겼으면 조금 마신 건 아니죠

translation.en: I'm… I'm just not used to drinking, that's all.
translation.ko: 제가 술을 잘 안 마셔서 그래요

translation.en: I… I just had a baby. So…
Okay, your friend probably go out clubbing or to a bar.
translation.ko: 그럼 친구분이 클럽이나 바에 갔나 보죠

translation.en: So we're supposed to be doing things, sightseeing and…
Did you check the hospitals? Maybe she had an accident.
translation.ko: 병원에 확인해 보셨어요? 사고가 났을 수도 있잖아요

translation.en: Yeah. I did, but there's no record of her being admitted.
[scoffs] Her friend ditched her for some guy, and she's upset.
translation.ko: 친구가 남자 때문에 자기를 버리고 가서 화가 났네

translation.en: [in English] Does she have her bag with her? Her wallet, her passport, keys?
[in English] Can I file a missing persons report?
No, you can't because you need to wait 24 hours.
Most people show up before then.
I'm sure your friend will too.
-Thanks for picking me up. -It was close by. It's no bother.
translation.ko: - 데리러 와줘서 고마워요 - 근처에 있었어요, 괜찮아요

translation.en: [sighs] I couldn't remember the name of the bar last night.
translation.ko: 어제 갔던 바 이름이 기억이 안 나요

translation.en: -You want me to come in with you? -No.
We were sitting right there with two guys.
translation.ko: 남자 두 명이랑 저기 앉아 있었어요

translation.en: She was wearing a blue dress.
Figured you could use some help.
[scoffs] I didn't know that was an actual, real thing?
No, she didn't hire them either.
might bring you out of your rut.
She kept going on and on about how I needed to have some fun.
translation.ko: 나한테 좀 즐겨야 한다고 몇 번이고 말하더니

translation.en: I wondered why he was into me.
The barman says he's seen them there a lot.
[sighs] Does he know how to get a hold of them?
Uh, he only knew their first names.
Come on. I'll take you back.
[Rob on phone] You went to the police?
I mean, this is Kate we're talking about. She's not exactly reliable.
translation.ko: 케이트가 없어진 거잖아 신뢰성이 없는 사람이라고

translation.en: [Beth] No, no, she wouldn't do this to me. Leave without telling me?
translation.ko: 아니, 나한테 말도 없이 사라질 애가 아니야

translation.en: How many times on a night out did she ditch you for a bloke she just met?
translation.ko: 케이트가 처음 만난 남자 때문에 당신을 몇 번이나 버렸더라?

translation.en: [Beth] No, I've left her dozens of messages.

translation.ko: - 무슨 일이 생긴 거야 - 괜한 걱정 마

translation.en: I've got some brilliant pictures to show you of Aster by the way.
translation.ko: 참, 애스터 사진 찍었는데 너무 귀여워서 보여줄게

translation.en: Earlier on, we were watching The Godfather, and it turns out
translation.ko: 아까 '대부'를 봤는데 침대에 말 머리통이 있는 장면을 엄청 좋아하는 거 있지

translation.en: she really likes the part where they find the horse's head in the bed.
translation.ko: 침대에 말 머리통이 있는 장면을 엄청 좋아하는 거 있지

translation.en: Do you need me to pick you up from the airport?
I can't believe it's nearly Sunday already.
-I'll have to change my flight. -You can't.
-What about Aster? -You don't think I want to come home, Rob?
translation.ko: - 애스터는 어쩌고? - 나라고 집에 가기 싫겠어?

translation.en: Yeah. God, of course. Yeah, sorry.
-Do… Do you need me to come over? -No, It's okay.
All right. Just call if you need me, yeah?
[Zain] I called and said I wanted to hire them for a private party.
translation.ko: 전화해서 비공개 파티에 고용하고 싶다고 했어요

translation.en: What if they don't know anything, or what if they won't tell us?
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 아무것도 모르거나 말을 안 해주면 어쩌죠?

translation.en: -Maybe we should go to the police. -No, I'll handle it.
translation.ko: 경찰서로 가야 할까 봐요 아뇨, 내가 해결할게요

translation.en: I was on a semester abroad.
I met my husband Rob through her.
We hit it off straight away.
You know, right away, she's an extrovert.

translation.ko: 제 아내는 그런 걸 '카르니베'라고 해요 - '카르니베'? 무슨 뜻인데요? - 네

translation.en: How did you meet your wife?
She was a doctor at the hospital where I was doing my nursing training?
translation.ko: 아내가 의사로 있던 병원에서 제가 간호 실습을 받았어요

translation.en: She believed me when I say I was a nice guy
and agreed to go out with me. [chuckles]
Is Mina okay with you helping me?
-The woman you were with Friday night. -Kate! What have you done with her?
translation.ko: - 금요일 밤에 너랑 있던 여자! - 케이트한테 무슨 짓 했어요?

translation.en: -I have done nothing. -So why did you run just now?
translation.ko: - 아무 짓 안 했어요 - 그럼 아까 왜 튀었어?

translation.en: -She hired us for a good time. That's all. -[Zain] Don't lie to me!
translation.ko: - 즐기려고 우릴 부른 거예요 - 거짓말 마!

translation.en: -What's he saying? -[Zain] They took her handbag?
When was the last time you saw her?
[Zain] 3:00 a.m. What'd you do with the bag? Answer!
Did you put something in my water at the bar?

translation.ko: - 내 물에 약 탔어요? - 말해! 아뇨!

translation.en: I don't need to drug women. Come on. Please let me go. Okay?
translation.ko: 여자 꼬시는 데 약 필요 없어요 놔주세요, 네?

translation.en: Please, I'll get you the bag. Okay? Please.
[in Croatian] I didn't know they were stolen!
-[Zain] You think you were drugged? -[Beth] I've never been that drunk before?
translation.ko: 약에 취했던 것 같아요? 난 그 정도로 취한 적이 없어요

translation.en: They got me a glass of water. They could've slipped something into it.
translation.ko: 그자들이 물을 갖다줬으니 거기에 뭘 탔을 수도 있죠

translation.en: What if they drugged Kate too, you know? So they could rob us.
translation.ko: 케이트한테도 약을 먹여서 우리를 털려고 한 걸까요?

translation.en: Why didn't they take your bag too?
translation.ko: 그럼 당신 가방은 왜 안 훔쳤을까요?

translation.en: Well, she did hire them to have sex with you.
[Beth] No, no. She would never hurt me.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 저한테 나쁜 짓을 할 친구가 아니에요

translation.en: I don't want to get in trouble.
If they revoke my visa, I have no place else to go.
translation.ko: 난 비자가 취소되면 갈 곳이 없어요

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry for dragging you into all this.
You're not dragging me into anything.
Call me if you need me, okay?
And look, now I have proof. Something must have happened to her.
translation.ko: 증거도 찾았잖아요 무슨 일이 생긴 거예요

translation.en: Let's not jump to conclusions. Let's start with details.
-Your friend's name, date of birth-- -No, I gave this to him already yesterday.
translation.ko: - 친구분 이름과 생년월일… - 아니, 어제 저분한테 말했어요

translation.en: -You didn't file it? -He told me to come back in 24 hours.
translation.ko: - 처리 안 했어? - 24시간 후에 다시 오랬어요

translation.en: I figured her friend was out partying.
[scoffing] They brought two escorts back to their apartment.
translation.ko: 아파트에 매춘남 두 명을 데려간 사람들이잖아

translation.en: They were drunk. Probably high on drugs.
No, I… I wasn't doing drugs. And… I didn't know they were escorts.
translation.ko: 저 약 안 했어요 그리고 그 남자들이 매춘남인지도 몰랐고요

translation.en: Something bad has happened to her.
[Kate] I don't think they're serial killers, Beth.
translation.ko: 저 남자들이 연쇄 살인범은 아닐 거야

translation.en: And even if they are, I don't know if I care. Look at them.
You need to interview these men.
they might have drugged me or maybe both of us.
translation.ko: 저한테 약을 먹인 것 같아요 어쩌면 케이트한테도요

translation.en: You just said you didn't do drugs.
I… I didn't do drugs. I was drugged.
-There's a difference. -Funny you didn't mention it before.
translation.ko: - 그 둘은 달라요 - 아까는 말 안 했잖아요

translation.en: 'Cause I wasn't sure. I'm still not.
[in Croatian] Can you get her some water?
Then run these names through the system.
[in English] I'm sorry about my colleague.
is it possible you may have been assaulted?
Well, when we're done here, we'll take you to the hospital
translation.ko: 그럼 얘기 끝나고 병원으로 모셔다드릴 테니

translation.en: for a drug test and a checkup.
And they admitted they stole it,
and then gave it back to you.
I explained Kate was missing, and I…
told them I wouldn't go to the police if they gave it back to me.
[nurse] Any signs of sexual assault are still inconclusive.
translation.ko: 성폭행 흔적이 있는지 아직 확실치 않아요

translation.en: We'll have those results and the results of the blood test within 24 hours.
translation.ko: 성폭행 여부와 혈액 검사 결과가 24간 내로 나올 겁니다

translation.en: -[Jay] It's a classic Kate move. -Going missing?
Always has to be the center of attention.
She wore red on our wedding day, I mean,
should've taken that as a warning of sharks in the water.
translation.ko: 그걸 상어 주의 경고처럼 생각했어야 하는데

translation.en: You haven't talked to her then?
[Jay] No, not for weeks. It's been bliss.
-No, no, you talked to her Friday night. -No, I didn't.
She said you called her about the credit card.
What credit card? All communication has to go through our lawyers.
translation.ko: 무슨 카드요? 우린 변호사 통해서만 연락해요

translation.en: Look, Beth, I can actually guarantee this whole disappearance act
translation.ko: 베스, 내가 장담하는데 이렇게 자취 감춘 거

translation.en: is a lot of bollocks, all right.
What credit card by the way?
What? Are you saying she's… [scoffs] faking her disappearance?
translation.ko: 네? 그럼 이게 자작극이라도 된다는 거예요?

translation.en: Why? Why would she do that?
Because drama is embedded in her DNA like an extra chromosome.
She once ran off to New York for a week after we had an argument
translation.ko: 나랑 싸우고 일주일간 뉴욕에 간 적도 있어요

translation.en: with no word if she was dead or alive.
All right, just trust me, she likes to punish people.
translation.ko: 그러니까 내 말 믿어요 케이트는 남 괴롭히길 즐겨요

translation.en: Look, I gotta go. Just call me, and let me know what happens, all right?
translation.ko: 끊어야겠네요 무슨 일 있으면 연락 줘요

translation.en: -Did you go to the police? -[Beth] Yeah, they're looking for her.
I'm staying till they find her.
If your friend shows up, at least you will be close by.
translation.ko: 혹시 친구가 나타나면 가까이 있는 게 좋잖아요

translation.en: Uh, there should be towels in the bathroom, and…
just let me know if you need anything else.
I think you're gonna love it.
[on voicemail] You've reached Rob, leave me a message after the--
I was about to order in.
Uh, I… I was about to go out actually.
I had to get out of there.
Let's get some food before we start looking.
-I know a very good Syrian-- -[Rob] Beth.
Uh, what are you doing here?
I've been calling you all day to let you know I was on my way.
My parents are away. Remember? In the Dordogne. She'll be fine.
translation.ko: 부모님이 도르도뉴에 가셨잖아 애스터는 괜찮을 거야

translation.en: -Sorry, am I interrupting something? -No. This is Zain.
translation.ko: 내가 방해한 거야? 아니, 이쪽은 제인이야

translation.en: He's a taxi driver. And he's been helping me look for Kate.
translation.ko: 택시 기사인데 케이트 찾는 걸 도와주고 있어

translation.en: Let me know if you hear anything.
Who the bloody hell is he? [chuckles]
-I just told you. He's the taxi driver. -Who you were going to dinner with.
translation.ko: - 택시 기사라니까 - 같이 저녁 먹으려고 했잖아

translation.en: Give me a break. He's been helping me.
He… He drove me and Kate to a bar the night that she went missing--
translation.ko: 케이트가 실종되던 날 밤 우리를 바에 태워다 줬고…

translation.en: Beth, are you kidding? What if he's involved?
translation.ko: 그걸 말이라고 해? 저 사람이 엮였으면 어쩌려고?

translation.en: [scoffs] No. You were just about to get into a car with him.
I didn't mean to upset you.
Why didn't you tell me? I would've flown straight over.
translation.ko: 왜 나한테 말 안 했어? 말하면 바로 왔을 텐데

translation.en: I couldn't tell you over the phone.
Do the police think they're involved in her going missing?
translation.ko: 경찰은 케이트 실종 사건에 그자들이 연루됐다고 봐?

translation.en: They don't seem to have a clue. And they're barely lifting a finger to find her.
translation.ko: 경찰은 아무것도 몰라 찾으려는 노력도 안 해

translation.en: [Rob] What if Jay's right, and she's messing with us?
translation.ko: 제이 말대로 케이트가 우리를 약 올리는 거면?

translation.en: She likes to be the center of attention, yes, but she wouldn't do this to me.
translation.ko: 주목받는 걸 좋아하지만 나한테 이런 짓을 할 리 없어

translation.en: [man] She's been in the water for some time.
It's too soon to say. The autopsy will tell us more.
translation.ko: 아직은 모릅니다 부검하면 자세히 나올 거예요

translation.en: But you think it was an accident? [sniffles] That she fell in?
Or do you think she was killed?
We need to wait for the result of the autopsy.
We'll be in touch when we know more.
I feel bad, you know, for finding her annoying.
I have to get going soon. You sure you don't want to come with me?
translation.ko: 가야겠어 정말 같이 안 가도 괜찮아?

translation.en: We talked about this. I have to…
stay till after the autopsy and…
translation.ko: 부검 끝날 때까지 있을 거야 그리고…

translation.en: -There's the arrangements to figure out. -Yeah. Sorry. Sorry.
They can't tell if she was sexually assaulted given the state of the body.
translation.ko: 시신 상태를 봤을 때 성폭행 여부는 불확실하대요

translation.en: And the fact she had sex with multiple partners on the night she went missing.
translation.ko: 실종되던 날 밤 여러 명이랑 자기도 했고요

translation.en: Can I have a minute? Please?
[on voicemail] You've reached Rob, leave me a message after the tone.
translation.ko: 롭입니다, 삐 소리 후 메시지를 남겨주세요

translation.en: It shows high levels of cocaine and ketamine in Kate's system.
Did you know she was taking drugs?
You'd already made a judgment about who she was.
translation.ko: 안 그래도 케이트를 안 좋게 보셨잖아요

translation.en: I thought it would stop you looking for her, and it did.
translation.ko: 말하면 안 찾으실 테니까요 실제로도 그랬고요

translation.en: [Kovac] The results of your blood work came back too.
They also found traces of ketamine.
See. I… I told you I was drugged.
[Kovac] We interviewed the two men you identified.
translation.ko: 당신이 지목한 남자 둘과 얘기해 봤습니다

translation.en: They deny giving you any illegal substances.
And they also have alibis for the time of the murder.
A taxi driver picked them up outside your apartment.
translation.ko: 택시 기사가 당신 아파트 밖에서 두 사람을 태웠다더군요

translation.en: Their roommate can vouch for them too.
She's divorcing him. Isn't that a motive?
translation.ko: 이혼 절차 중이에요 그거 살해 동기 아닌가요?

translation.en: [Beth] It's only a two-hour flight from here.
We interviewed people from the Blue Parlour,
translation.ko: 블루 팔러에 있던 사람들과 얘기해 봤는데

translation.en: and several people saw you and Kate arguing when you left.
translation.ko: 당신과 케이트가 나갈 때 싸우는 걸 봤대요

translation.en: You didn't argue with Kate then, hours before she died?
translation.ko: 그럼 케이트가 죽기 몇 시간 전 싸우지 않았다는 거예요?
긴장 풀어, 난 모험을 하는 거야

translation.en: I thought you didn't recall anything about that night.
translation.ko: 그날 밤 일은 전혀 기억이 안 난다면서요

translation.en: I… I passed out in the taxi, but I remember some things.
translation.ko: 택시에서 잠들었는데 그래도 몇 가지는 기억나요

translation.en: You think I have something to do with Kate's murder?
Is there anything else you haven't told us?
translation.ko: 또 저희한테 얘기 안 한 게 있나요?

translation.en: [officer] We need your passport until we can verify your statement.
translation.ko: 당신 진술을 확인할 때까지 여권을 압수해야 합니다

translation.en: [in English] Let's hope your story checks out.
Look, I was going to, but, uh, you were about to have a baby.
translation.ko: 말하려고 했는데… 당신이 애 낳기 직전이어서요

translation.en: My husband was having an affair with my best friend,
and you didn't think I had the right to know.
How long was it going on for?
I guess she was trying to get back at me. Tit for Tat.
You know they had a thing at Uni.
Yeah, yeah, a drunken one-night stand at freshman week.
translation.ko: 네, 입학 직전에 술 먹고 하룻밤 잤죠

translation.en: -What are you saying? -[Jay] I'm not saying anything.
maybe there were some latent feelings on her part.
[Beth] How could I have not seen it?
We don't see what we don't want to see.
translation.ko: 사람은 보기 싫은 건 안 보니까요

translation.en: I've been feeling so guilty for…
to look up and see what was staring me in the face.
translation.ko: 고개를 들고 눈앞에 있는 걸 바라볼 수도 없었어요

translation.en: What if she did drug me
so I would sleep with someone
or not know if I had or hadn't?
Then she could get Rob to leave me.
translation.ko: 그러면 롭을 나한테서 떼어놓을 수 있을 테니까

translation.en: Do you think he could have killed Kate?
And I spoke to him over the weekend.
You never wondered if it was me?
Where I come from, we say Alalbek Daleelek.
She was working in a clinic.
I was late to pick her up.
[Rob on phone] You there? Hello? Hi?
Hey, um, I was putting Aster down. Sorry, I got your message. You okay?
translation.ko: 애스터 재우느라, 미안 메시지 받았어, 괜찮아?

translation.en: Beth, what are you talking about?
That you were sleeping with her for months.
[chuckling nervously] Uh, what? What you talking about?
Stop treating me like an idiot. I found the text messages on her phone.
translation.ko: 사람 바보 취급 하지 마 케이트 휴대폰에서 문자 봤어

translation.en: I don't know what to say. I'm sorry.
I only did it because we… When was the last time we had sex?
translation.ko: 내가 그랬던 이유는… 우리가 언제 마지막으로 잤지?

translation.en: -You were depressed and I-- -No! You do not get to blame this on me.
translation.ko: - 당신은 우울해하고 난… - 아니, 내 탓 하지 마!

translation.en: -No, I'm not blam… Look, I'm sorry-- -[Beth] Stop apologizing!
translation.ko: - 그게 아니라… 미안해 - 미안하단 말도 관둬!

translation.en: Look, you've just got to come home. We can't do this over the phone.
translation.ko: 일단 집에 와 이런 얘기 전화로 하지 말자

translation.en: because the police have taken my passport because I'm sure they think I killed Kate.
translation.ko: 못 가, 경찰이 여권을 가져갔어 내가 케이트를 죽였다고 생각하거든

translation.en: And if they find out about the affair, they'll have a damn good reason too.
translation.ko: 경찰이 불륜 사실을 알게 되면 그걸 내 살해 동기로 생각하겠지

translation.en: -I am so sorry. -[Beth] Just shut up.
[sniffling] I just want to see Aster.
Beth Jenner, we're arresting you on suspicion of the murder of Kate Thompson.
translation.ko: 베스 제너, 케이트 제너의 살해 용의자로 체포합니다

translation.en: [officer] Put your hands behind your back. What?
For how long have you known Mr. Zakaria?
How did the two of you meet?
He took me and Kate to the bar on Friday night.
translation.ko: 금요일 밤에 저랑 케이트를 바에 태워다 줬어요

translation.en: He's been helping me look for her.
Why didn't you tell us he was with you when you confronted the escorts?
translation.ko: 왜 매춘남들을 만날 때 같이 있었단 말을 안 했죠?

translation.en: Or that he physically assaulted one of them?
translation.ko: 자카리아가 둘 중 하나를 폭행했다는 것도요

translation.en: He got them to admit it. He got the bag back.
translation.ko: 제인이 자백을 받아내고 가방을 돌려받게 해줬어요

translation.en: Mr. Zakaria is connected to organized crime.
He's a member of an Albanian gang
involved in human trafficking, among other things.
You didn't know this about him?
No. No, of course not. What… What are you saying?
[in English] And you hired him to do it.
This is insane! This is insane!
How do you… You can't possibly think I had anything to do with this!
Please! Why would I want Kate dead?
translation.ko: 제발요, 제가 왜 케이트가 죽길 바라겠어요?

translation.en: Because she was having an affair with your husband.
You didn't think we'd find out.
Jay has known about it for months.
We are speaking to him later today.
Just because they haven't charged you doesn't mean they won't.
translation.ko: 아직 기소를 안 했다고 안 할 거란 보장은 없어요

translation.en: It is only because they don't have enough evidence yet.
They were hoping they could press you on your connection to Mr. Zacharia,
Call me next time before you say anything to incriminate yourself.
translation.ko: 다음엔 불리한 말 하기 전에 나한테 전화해요

translation.en: They told me you'd been arrested.
I was driving all Friday night until Saturday morning.
translation.ko: 난 금요일 밤부터 토요일 아침까지 운전했거든요

translation.en: you have links to an Albanian criminal gang.
translation.ko: 당신이 알바니아 범죄 조직과 연관이 있다더군요

translation.en: I don't know who to believe.
I saved the life of a boy who'd been hit with shrapnel in the leg.
translation.ko: 다리에 폭탄 파편을 맞은 남자애를 살린 적이 있어요

translation.en: His father has connections to an Albanian people-smuggling ring.
translation.ko: 그 애 아빠가 알바니아의 인신매매 조직과 연줄이 있는데

translation.en: He got me out of Aleppo, crossed the border into Turkey then here.
translation.ko: 날 알레포에서 빼내서 터키 국경을 건너 여기 오게 해줬죠

translation.en: So you don't work for this person?
translation.ko: 그럼 그 사람 밑에서 일하는 게 아니에요?

translation.en: How do I know you're telling me the truth?
[in Arabic] Your heart is your guide.
[Beth] You can't possibly think I had anything to do with this.
Why would I want Kate dead?
Because she was having an affair with your husband.
My husband was having an affair with my best friend.
You didn't think I had the right to know?
Uh, my cell data ran out.
Could I get the Wi-Fi password?
translation.ko: 와이파이 비밀번호 좀 알 수 있을까요?

translation.en: [Sebastian] What happened with the police? They let you go.
translation.ko: 경찰 조사는 어떻게 됐어요? 당신을 풀어줬네요

translation.en: [Sebastian] And how much longer do you think you'll be staying here?
A screening for a movie I supervised the music for.
Come on, come on, come on.
-Well, thanks. Are you sure? -[Kate] Yeah, no, for sure. Come on.
-[Mateo] Here we go. -[Kate] Watch your step.
Somebody's gonna have a beautiful night of sleep.
Let's get you ready for bed. Yeah. Whoa.
-[Beth] No! -No! Stop! It's not what you think!
translation.ko: - 안 돼! - 잠깐, 그런 거 아니에요!

translation.en: You're taping people in the shower having sex!
translation.ko: 사람들이 샤워실에서 섹스하는 걸 찍고 있잖아요!

translation.en: And you knew what happened to Kate this whole time. You could have told the police.
translation.ko: 케이트가 어떻게 됐는지 알면 경찰에 얘기했어야죠

translation.en: You told them about my husband's affair, didn't you?
translation.ko: 내 남편이 바람피우는 거 당신이 경찰에 말했죠?

translation.en: What is that? No. Don't delete them.
translation.ko: 그거 뭐예요? 안 돼, 지우지 마요!

translation.en: [Sebastian] Stop, you don't understand! Stop. I can explain.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 당신이 몰라서 그래요 가지 마요, 내가 설명할게요

translation.en: He… He deleted all the videos.
He's gonna tell the police I attacked him.
translation.ko: 제가 자기를 공격했다고 경찰에 말할 거예요

translation.en: Oh my God, this is a nightmare.
We'll find out where Kate went,
then we can hopefully find out who brought her home.
Then we can go to the police. We will explain. It will be okay.
translation.ko: 그 후에 경찰한테 말하면 괜찮을 거예요

translation.en: I gave him the license number.
Okay, I'll remember that for next time.
They say you're a suspect in Kate's murder.
You picked up a woman early Saturday morning around 3:00.
translation.ko: 토요일 새벽 3시쯤 여자 한 명을 태우셨죠

translation.en: -She's my height, blonde hair. -[Zain] On Jerina Street.
We just need to know where you took her. That's all.
She made me follow these two men. She said they stole her bag.
translation.ko: 두 남자를 따라가 달라더군요 자기 가방을 훔쳐 갔다고요

translation.en: I lost them on a one-way street.
[in English] What's he saying? Where'd you take her?
[Beth] If Kate reported her bag stolen,
why wasn't there a record of it when I reported her missing?
translation.ko: 왜 제가 실종 신고 했을 때 아무 기록이 없었을까요?

translation.en: Pavic didn't file my report either.
We need to get out of here.
[Kovac] Beth! Don't leave! We just want to talk.
I saw the sticker in the security footage.
translation.ko: 보안 영상에서 그 차 번호판을 봤어요

translation.en: He must've driven Kate home after she reported her bag stolen.
translation.ko: 케이트가 도난 신고를 한 다음 집에 태워다 준 거예요

translation.en: Oh my God. Oh my God. Oh my God.
It was him. It was him.
-Make her meet you. -[Beth] Wait. Where are you going?
Believe me it's him. It's the cop who did it.
-[Kovac] What're you talking about? -[Zain] We saw the footage.
translation.ko: - 그 경찰이 범인이라고요 - 무슨 소리예요? - 영상을 봤어요 - 무슨 말이에요?

translation.en: [Beth] You hit on her, didn't you?
My God, you did! You hit on her, and she rejected you!
translation.ko: 맞군요, 당신이 들이댔는데 케이트가 거절한 거야!

translation.en: That's what men call women who won't sleep with them!
translation.ko: 여자가 안 자주면 남자들은 그렇게 욕하지

translation.en: And we recovered some of your landlord's footage.
I'm so sorry I doubted you. You were right.
Pavic drove Kate home after she reported her bag stolen.
translation.ko: 케이트가 도난 신고를 한 후 파비츠가 집에 태워다 줬더군요

translation.en: We think he did make a pass at her.
we can safely assume Pavic hit her over the back of the head,
translation.ko: 파비츠가 케이트의 뒤통수를 가격한 것으로 추정됩니다

translation.en: and then dumped her body in the harbor
he arrested for sex work claimed he assaulted them.
but the women all withdrew their statements.
so unfortunately, they moved him over to the tourist division.
on Luka and Mateo's apartment and workplace too.
They've been drugging the women who hired them then robbing them.
translation.ko: 그간 자신들을 고용한 여자들한테 약을 먹이고 물건을 훔쳤더군요

translation.en: but the cocaine in her system counteracted it.
translation.ko: 케이트 체내의 코카인이 그걸 중화한 거죠

translation.en: So I'm free to go then.
In case you want to press charges against your landlord.
Uh, I just put the kettle on. Do you want to stay for a cuppa?
translation.ko: 방금 주전자 올렸는데 차 마시고 갈래?

translation.en: Uh, I packed clothes and Ernie the sheep in the bag.
I can pop out and get some. No worries.
translation.ko: 나가서 사 오면 돼, 걱정 마

translation.en: Hey, there's this kids' art thing at the park tomorrow.
translation.ko: 내일 공원에서 애들 미술 행사가 있어

translation.en: I was thinking of taking Aster if you fancy joining us.
translation.ko: 애스터 데려갈 건데 생각 있으면 같이 가

translation.en: Maybe we could have lunch after at Georgio's, the three of us.
translation.ko: 그 후에 조지오스에서 셋이 점심 먹어도 좋고

translation.en: You know, uh, I think you might have my spare car key.
translation.ko: 저기, 내 차 스페어 키 당신한테 있는 것 같아

translation.en: Yeah, it's probably in the bowl in the hallway
translation.ko: 응, 복도에 놔둔 그릇에 있을 거야

translation.en: Oh my God, I'm so sorry.
I can't find Ernie the sheep.
Where did you say it was?
It's… It's in the bag. I'll… I'll get it.
I'm gonna stay for that cup of tea.
If that's, uh, still up for offer.
Suppose you've got a lot to do before you start work on Monday.
translation.ko: 월요일에 일하기 전에 할 일이 많겠네

translation.en: Did you get the child-minding sorted?
You're looking at me strangely. Do you…
Is this some kind of joke?
You flew back Saturday morning. Won't be hard to check the flights.
translation.ko: 토요일 아침에 돌아왔겠지 항공편 확인하면 금방 나와

translation.en: Beth, come on. You can't be serious.
It's from her necklace, and I found it in your jacket.
translation.ko: 케이트 목걸이에서 빠진 거야 당신 재킷에서 찾았어

translation.en: I can explain. It was an accident.
-What did you do? -Stop. Wait. Listen to me. Listen to me.
translation.ko: - 무슨 짓을 한 거야? - 가지 마, 내 말 들어줘

translation.en: And I was waiting outside the apartment.
I'd been calling and texting. She wasn't picking up. I thought…
translation.ko: 계속 전화랑 문자를 했는데 케이트가 안 받길래

translation.en: I was terrified she told you.
She kept threatening to. I thought if she had, I could at least talk to you.
translation.ko: 날 계속 협박했거든, 말했으면 당신이랑 얘기라도 하고 싶었어

translation.en: I was about to leave, but then she showed up.
Jesus. What the hell are you doing here?
You know this makes you a stalker.
I didn't have a choice. You wouldn't answer your phone.
Let's go. Come on. Come on.
We ended up down by the water, and we talked.
You're gonna ruin her life. You wanna do that? I don't.
translation.ko: 그럼 베스 인생 망치는 거야 그러고 싶어? 난 싫어

translation.en: we're doing this. You and me.
How many times? It meant nothing.
translation.ko: 몇 번을 말해? 아무 의미 없었다니까

translation.en: How can you say it meant nothing?
Why were we doing it if it meant nothing?
I know. You have feelings for me.
She told me… She told me she was in love with me.
She, she, she… She kept begging me.
She was begging me to leave you.
She said you were unhappy. I'd be doing you a favor breaking up with you.
translation.ko: 당신이 불행해한다면서 헤어지는 게 도와주는 거랬는데

translation.en: I told her, I don't know how many times, that was never gonna happen.
translation.ko: 난 수도 없이 말했어 그럴 일은 절대 없다고

translation.en: What happened between us was a mistake.
It was the biggest mistake of my life?
[Kate] It was a rebound fling, and you…
[sighs] …were in the right place at the right time.
Actually, from now on, I'm only telling the truth.
-Maybe you should try it too. -[Rob] Please, please, Kate, please.
-Stop it! Get off me! -No, stop, listen to me!
She tripped and fell and banged her head.
I didn't mean to hurt her.
No. No, I… I thought she was dead.
-No, you didn't. -[Rob] That's why I left her.
You're lying. I saw the autopsy report. She drowned.
translation.ko: 거짓말, 부검 보고서 봤어 케이트는 익사했다고

translation.en: -She was alive in the water when you left. -I'm telling the truth.
translation.ko: - 당신이 떠날 때 살아 있었어 - 정말이야

translation.en: -You have to listen. -No, I don't have to listen!
translation.ko: - 내 말 좀 들어 - 당신이나 들어!

translation.en: I will never listen to you again. I should've listened to Kate.
translation.ko: 이제 당신 말은 절대 안 들어 케이트 말을 들었어야 해

translation.en: That's what the weekend was about.
She wanted to remind me who I was before I met you.
translation.ko: 당신을 만나기 전의 날 떠올리게 해주려고
난 더 좋은 사람 만나야 한다는 걸

translation.en: -What are you gonna do now, huh? -You killed my best friend.
translation.ko: 어쩌려고? - 내 절친을 죽였잖아 - 경찰에 말 안 할 거지?

translation.en: You're not gonna tell the police, are you?
translation.ko: - 내 절친을 죽였잖아 - 경찰에 말 안 할 거지?

translation.en: What would be the point? The case's closed. That cop's dead.
translation.ko: 말해서 뭐 해? 사건은 종결됐고 그 경찰도 죽었는데

translation.en: What good is me going to jail? Beth?
translation.ko: 내가 감옥 가서 좋을 게 뭐야? 베스?

translation.en: Please, I'm begging you. I'm begging you.
You want her to grow up without a dad?
Come on, you know I'm not.
No. You are not calling the police.
I got it all. The police are on their way. Beth?
translation.ko: 다 들었어요 경찰이 가고 있어요, 베스?

translation.en: [Beth] It's okay. Mama's got you. Mama's got you.
♪ When you came to me every night ♪
